item.title: Feature Toggles as Permissioning Toggles
item.description: I’m sure that everyone in the software industry has heard of the term “feature toggles”. I don’t know how many of you have used this feature in your workflow but feature toggles are a great way to on/off a feature that has not been yet implemented fully. This method used mostly in the teams that follow continuous integration practices.
